page.title: 05Churches in Sutton on Sea.
page.content: There are 3 churches in Sutton one is the parish church of Sutton.It is called St Clement's.It is on Church Lane facing north.Its vicar is the{Rev Rudman}and he is helped by the{Rev.Baker. }There is also a Methodist Chapel in the middle of Sutton.The minister is the{Rev Jolly. The other church is St Peter's in Trusthorpe.It's vicar is{Rev Wood}he came to St Peter's in 1976.He became a vicar when he was 22.Part of his job is seeing peoples lives change.The thing he does not like to see is people grumling about the church.St Peter's was built in 1281.It is built on a slope with grave stores around it.There is a clock on the west side of the church it was put there 1980.Inside the chapel is an organ. There are 7 stain glass windows.Next to the chapel is a Sunday school room.
